bfh.name: Black Forest Ham
bfh.description: Our Black Forest Ham sandwich is a true classic. We add lettuce, baby spinach, cucumbers, green peppers and red onions to our delicious, thin-sliced ham and serve it on our Hearty Multigrain bread. Want cheese? Just ask.
